sql.sql: select t.* from zh_shglxxb t where t.fhywzjuuid = $fhywzjuuid$ order by t.lrrq desc
select s.* from Zh_Nsxybfpsqb s where s.djxh = ? and s.sqbpnd = ? and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and s.nsrxyfpyy_dm is not null
select f.* from zh_ndnsxybfpxx f where f.djxh = ? and f.sqbpnd = ? and f.nsxybfpsqbuuid =? and nvl(f.zfbz_1,'N') = ?
select j.* from jc_swjctzsy j where j.swjg_dm = ? and j.nsrsbh = ? and (1 = ? OR j.jcssqjq > = ?) and (1 = ? OR j.jcssqjz < = ?) and j.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = ?

select s.*, c.swjg_dm, c.sfzdxh, c.wssdfs_dm, c.xqts, c.wsmrsdr, c.sdjgts, c.wssddz from zh_sdxx s, cs_zh_zdxhwspzb c, zh_sdhz h where nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(h.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and s.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid and (h.hzzzrq + c.sdjgts) < (sysdate + 1) and s.sdzt_dm != '03' and s.dzbzdszl_dm = c.dzbzdszl_dm and s.tfjg_dm = c.swjg_dm and c.sfzdxh = 'Y' and s.dzbzdszl_dm not in ('BDA1220079', 'BDA1220172', 'BDA1220090', 'BDA1120037', 'BDA1020059', 'BDA1020042', 'BDA1120123')

with kk as (select max(zhb.lsrwbh) lsrwbh,zhb.djxh from fp_dcxczhb zhb where zhb.dcxczhuuid in (select qd.dcxczhuuid from fp_dcxcqdb qd, (select distinct qdmx.dcxcqduuid, qdmx.djxh from fp_dcxcqdb_mx qdmx where qdmx.djxh in #macroparam#) qdbmx where qd.dcxcqduuid = qdbmx.dcxcqduuid and qd.qdpch in #macroparam#) and zhb.djxh in #macroparam# group by zhb.dcxczhuuid ,zhb.djxh) select distinct pf.sssxdcnsruuid, pf.lsrwbh, pf.dcswjg_dm, pf.dcr_dm, pf.dcrjh, pf.pfswjg_dm, pf.pfr_dm, pf.jsjg_dm, pf.jsr_dm, pf.jsrjh, pf.lcslid, pf.blzt_dm, nvl(pf.xgrq, pf.lrrq) pfrq, pf.lrr_dm, pf.lrrq, pf.xgrq, pf.xgr_dm, pf.sjgsdq, pf.xguuid, kk.djxh from fp_sssxdcnsrpfb pf,kk where pf.lsrwbh = kk.lsrwbh
select t.* from Zh_Sxpqcktsxsysjctzs t where t.sxpqcktsxsysjcspbuuid = ? and t.zfbz_1 = ?

select a.*, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq, h.wssdfs_dm, h.wsssdrxm, h.wssdrxm, h.wssddz, h.wssdrq, h.dsr, h.xhrq_1, h.dsly, h.jsly, h.xhr_dm, h.jzrxm_1, h.lcslid, h.hdslid, h.sjslid, h.hzdh, h.ggrq, h.xqgzsj from zh_sdxx a, zh_sdhz h where a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid(+) and a.sdwsuuid in (#macroparam#) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(h.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.uuid,t.jsswjg_dm,t.nsrsbh,t.nsrmc,t.jnbjjzrqymc,t.jnbjjzrqyzgswjgdm ,t.srfmc,t.srfzgswjgdm,t.zrfmc,t.sxrq,t.clyj,t.lxr,t.lxdh,t.fhswjg_dm,t.fhrq_2, t.lcslid,t.srfnsrsbh,t.zrfnsrsbh,t.jnbjjzrqynsrsbh,t.hjbh from ZH_FJMQYJJZRGZH t where t.uuid = $uuid$
select t.uuid, t.jsswjg_dm, t.slrq, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.fjuuid, t.lxr, t.lxdh, t.fhswjg_dm, t.fhrq_2, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.yxbz, t.lcslid, t.hjbh from zh_fjmqyjjzrzgccgzlxd t where t.uuid = $uuid$
select s.* from Zh_Nsxybfpsqb s where s.djxh = ? and s.sqbpnd = ? and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and s.nsrxybpyy_dm is not null
select t.* from cs_fz_nfjgygljgdzb t where t.nfjg_dm = ?

select t. SSSXNBYSJFKBUUID, t. UUID, t. DJXH, t. AJBH_1, t. NSRSBH, t. NSRMC, t. SCJYDZ, t. LXDH, t. JSBM_DM, t. NBYSSSSXLX_DM, t. CZYD, t. QTSM, t. FPSHJCBZ, t. YJR_DM, t. YJRQ, t. YJBM_DM, t. FKBM_DM, t. FKRQ, t. FKNR, t. CLBZ, t. CLRQ, t. CLJG, t. FKDJR_DM, t. FKDJRQ, t. ZSR_DM, t. ZSRQ_3, t. ZSTYBZ, t. HDSLID, t. LCSLID, t. LRRQ, t. LRR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. SJGSDQ, t. LCSWSX_DM, t. FLCSLID, t. QDR_DM, t. QDRQ, t. QDSWJG_DM from ZH_SSSXNBYSJFKB t where t.DJXH = ? and nvl(t.uuid, ?) = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' order by t.lrrq desc
select t.* from zh_nsrjjjsgsjgdzskgzh t where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.uuid = $uuid$
select g.* from Zh_Gyckqylaccqkgzs g where g.sssxnbysjfkbuuid = ? and g.zfbz_1 = ?

with swjg as (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where s.sjswjg_dm = ? union select #macroparam# as swjg_dm from dual), swjg22 as (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where s.sjswjg_dm in (select gljg_dm as swjg_dm from cs_fz_nfjgygljgdzb where nfjg_dm = ?) union select gljg_dm as swjg_dm from cs_fz_nfjgygljgdzb where nfjg_dm = ?) select a.*, h.wsssdrxm, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq from zh_sdxx a left join zh_sdhz h on a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid where a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sdwsuuid in (#macroparam#)) and exists (select 1 from swjg t where t.swjg_dm = a.tfjg_dm) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and h.lcslid is null union select a.*, h.wsssdrxm, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq from zh_sdxx a left join zh_sdhz h on a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid where a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sdwsuuid in (#macroparam#)) and a.lrr_dm = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and h.lcslid is null union select a.*, h.wsssdrxm, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq from jc_ajxx t, zh_sdxx a left join zh_sdhz h on a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid where t.jcajxxuuid = a.ajxxuuid and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.zxry is not null and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and instr(t.zxry, ?) > 0 and a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) union select a.*, h.wsssdrxm, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq from zh_sdxx a left join zh_sdhz h on a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid where a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sdwsuuid in (#macroparam#)) and exists (select 1 from swjg22 t where t.swjg_dm = a.tfjg_dm) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and h.lcslid is null

select z.* from zh_ndnsxybfpxx_zb z where exists (select f.ndnsxybfpxxuuid from zh_ndnsxybfpxx f where f.ndnsxybfpxxuuid = z.ndnsxybfpxxuuid and f.djxh = ? and f.sqbpnd = ? and f.nsxybfpsqbuuid = ? and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = ?) and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = ?
select t.* from CS_ZH_ZDXHWSPZB t where t.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where sjswjg_dm = $value1$ and SWJGBZ = '1') and t.dzbzdszl_dm = $value2$

select pfb.dcrjh, zhb.djxh from fp_dcxczhb zhb, fp_sssxdcnsrpfb pfb where zhb.lsrwbh = pfb.lsrwbh and pfb.dcrjh is not null and pfb.dcrjh !=' ' and (pfb.blzt_dm = '1' or pfb.blzt_dm = '2') and zhb.djxh = ?
select s.* from ZH_Sxpqcktsxsysjcspb s where s.sxpqcktsxsysjcspbuuid = ? and s.zfbz_1 = ?

select a.sdxxuuid, a.sdhzuuid, a.ajxxuuid, a.djxh, a.dzbzdszl_dm, a.sdwsuuid, a.gywsuuid, (a.swjgjg || '' || a.zg || '〔' || a.nh || '〕' || a.wh || '号') as wszg, a.tfjg_dm, a.tfrq, a.sdzt_dm, a.ywjd_dm, a.wssdsj, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq, h.wssdfs_dm, h.wsssdrxm, h.wssdrxm, h.wssddz, h.wssdrq, h.dsr, h.xhrq_1, h.dsly, h.jsly, h.xhr_dm, h.jzrxm_1, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, h.hzdh from zh_sdxx a, zh_sdhz h where a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid and a.ajxxuuid= ? and a.sdzt_dm='03' and a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(h.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select distinct zn_dm from hx_qx.qx_swjg_zns where swjg_dm=? and zn_dm in ('02','01') and yxbz='Y'
select dcb.dcswjg_dm, dcb.dcr_dm, dcb.dcrq, dcb.dcjsrq, dcb.dcjl_dm, dcb.dcjlsm, dcb.dcryqtqksm from fp_sssxdcb dcb where dcb.djxh=? and (dcb.clbz <>'Y' or dcb.clbz is null)

select t.bguuid, t.shglxxbuuid, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.fddbr, t.lxdh, t.lxdz, t.dcry_dm, t.dcrq, t.qyjbqk, t.yddchsqk, t.dchsjghjy, t.qtxysmdqk, t.dcrqz, t.bmldqz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.zfbz_1, t.wsbh from ZH_SWJCDCHSBG t where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.shglxxbuuid = $uuid$

with swjg as (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where s.sjswjg_dm = ? union select #macroparam# as swjg_dm from dual), swjg22 as (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where s.sjswjg_dm in (select gljg_dm as swjg_dm from cs_fz_nfjgygljgdzb where nfjg_dm = ?) union select gljg_dm as swjg_dm from cs_fz_nfjgygljgdzb where nfjg_dm = ?) select a.*, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq, h.wssdfs_dm, h.wsssdrxm, h.wssdrxm, h.wssddz, h.wssdrq, h.dsr, h.xhrq_1, h.dsly, h.jsly, h.xhr_dm, h.jzrxm_1, h.lcslid, h.hdslid, h.sjslid, h.hzdh, h.ggrq, h.xqgzsj from zh_sdxx a, zh_sdhz h where a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid and a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.ajxxuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.wsssdrxm like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzbh = ?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and exists (select 1 from swjg t where t.swjg_dm = a.tfjg_dm) union select a.*, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq, h.wssdfs_dm, h.wsssdrxm, h.wssdrxm, h.wssddz, h.wssdrq, h.dsr, h.xhrq_1, h.dsly, h.jsly, h.xhr_dm, h.jzrxm_1, h.lcslid, h.hdslid, h.sjslid, h.hzdh, h.ggrq, h.xqgzsj from zh_sdxx a, zh_sdhz h where a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid and a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.ajxxuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.wsssdrxm like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzbh = ?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.lrr_dm = ? union select a.*, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq, h.wssdfs_dm, h.wsssdrxm, h.wssdrxm, h.wssddz, h.wssdrq, h.dsr, h.xhrq_1, h.dsly, h.jsly, h.xhr_dm, h.jzrxm_1, h.lcslid, h.hdslid, h.sjslid, h.hzdh, h.ggrq, h.xqgzsj from zh_sdxx a, zh_sdhz h, jc_ajxx t where a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid and t.jcajxxuuid = a.ajxxuuid and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.zxry is not null and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and instr(t.zxry, ?) > 0 and a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.ajxxuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.wsssdrxm like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' union select a.*, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq, h.wssdfs_dm, h.wsssdrxm, h.wssdrxm, h.wssddz, h.wssdrq, h.dsr, h.xhrq_1, h.dsly, h.jsly, h.xhr_dm, h.jzrxm_1, h.lcslid, h.hdslid, h.sjslid, h.hzdh, h.ggrq, h.xqgzsj from zh_sdxx a, zh_sdhz h where a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid and a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.ajxxuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.wsssdrxm like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzbh = ?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and exists (select 1 from swjg22 t where t.swjg_dm = a.tfjg_dm)
SELECT JCBG.* FROM FP_SWJCDCHSBG JCBG, FP_SSSXDCB DCB WHERE JCBG.SSSXDCUUID = DCB.SSSXDCUUID #macroparam#

update zh_sdhz s set s.xhrq_1 = ?, s.xhr_dm = ?, s.wssddz = ?, s.WSSDFS_DM = ?, s.wssdrq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), s.wssdrxm = ?, s.xgr_dm = ?, s.xgrq = sysdate, s.dsr = ?, s.dsly = ?, s.jsly = ?, s.jzrxm_1 = ?, s.hzdh = ?, where s.sdhzuuid = ?
